title: Anonymous
description: SinclairI had a perfect life.The adoring husband.Beautiful children.Everything most people can only dream about.I had it all, until I didn't.AnonymousSecrets have a way of coming out.They claw at you.Threaten you.Hold you prisoner in your own mind.They keep you looking over your shoulder.If you're reading this,It's all over.The mask has fallen.I've been found out.How long can you remain Anonymous?
author: Jo-Anne Joseph
